website_summaries.verdict: Clever design in a solar lantern that folds down to carry  conveniently, but spreads out for lighting an area.
pros: Provides 3 different lighting modes, including an SOS blinking mode
Has both a solar charging mode and a fast charge mode from a USB port
Includes a hook, so you can hang it easily
3 light banks provide more light than a traditional style lantern
cons: Provides more of a directional light than a traditional lantern
Needs to hang for the best results

customer_reviews.title: Illuminating Backpacking Experience
customer_reviews.text: Took 2 of these on a 7 day family backpacking adventure, and used them every night. We hung one inside our tent, and used the second one outside for cooking. I sun-charged them before leaving on our adventure, and never had to charge them again on our trip. We were totally prepared to carry them open on the outside of our pack to re-charge, but never had to. We liked the two intensity light settings, and the emergency signal setting. They fold up nicely, and are not overly heavy. They double as great additions to your emergency kit at home too. Besides, I LOVE not using batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Cabezon

customer_reviews.title: This little light is BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take camping and I couldn't have been more impressed with it! It was bright and lasted the whole evening! Eventually it does get a little dimmer if you run it all night on the brightest setting but it stays on and still puts off an impressive amount of light even when dimmed. Charges easily enough-just put it in the sun! I'm thinking of buying a couple more just to spread around the campsite and keep on the lowest setting. This always works awesome as an emergency light to keep inside your home.
customer_reviews.author: Beckersly

customer_reviews.title: Some good some not so good
customer_reviews.text: Light is bright and it charged with the USB port in about 2.5 hours, The hook for hanging the unit up is a joke, thin and flimsy piece of plastic I expect it to break on the first use. If they would improve the hanger it would be impressive.. Have not tride to solar charge it yet, will let you know if it is a problem. The flip out light panels are about 5" long (125mm) should provide enough lite for a small tent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, great function
customer_reviews.text: I've had this light for over a year and have used it often. The solar panels still charge it fully. The option of charging with USB is great for those not-so-sunny days. Because of the way it folds up it can be used lots of ways and with varying levels of brightness. I was a little concerned about the plastic hook on the top which is used for hanging the light. It looks weak, but so far it has not broken. This is a functional and portable little light.
customer_reviews.author: Cyprus

customer_reviews.title: Nifty product, great stocking stuffer gift
customer_reviews.text: This is really nifty for its size. I bought it as a gift for my husband, and was expecting it to be a little larger but overall it’s awesome. It’s really bright and being able to adjust the “blades” is a added bonus. The hook on top seems a little flimsy, I’m not sure if we will hang it using the hook for very long, my husband was trying to think of a more sturdy way, we’ll see!
customer_reviews.author: lbeth

customer_reviews.title: The lantern is well made and stays lit for several hours.
customer_reviews.text: The lantern is well made and stays lit for several hours while on the first level of light. I drained it to see how long it would take and then charged it with the USB and it took about an hour to recharge it fully. Once we have some sunny days I'll drain it again and see how long it takes for solar charging. I intend to hook it to my backpack while hiking and use it at camp.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty cool, and has a solar panel on each ...
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty cool, and has a solar panel on each "wing", I love the battery free recharge feature. It is bright enough, and has a soft white light feature so it isn't blinding light. The hook to hang it by seems kind of flimsy, may not last long, but I will be keeping it. Will be easy enough to modify the hook if needed. A good deal and product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: drumlady

customer_reviews.title: An Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome edition to anyone's tent. Incredibly cost effective, you don't have the dangers that come with a traditional lantern. The light is really bright! On High it lasted over 2.5 hrs. It charges quickly via USB or the solar panels on the back! Anne at the Upper West Companies is Amazing! It shipped from her to me super fast, I had it in two days! Definitely an awesome small business to get behind and support before looking at the big box stores! They are a favorite in my book!
customer_reviews.author: ricky crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light. Timed both charge and discharge and the product specs are accurate. Only one small improvement would make it an even better product. The on/off switch is exposed on the outside of the unit even when folded. Easy for the unit to accidentally switch on when in a bag with other items. Would be better with a switch that was on the inside when folded to protect from accidental discharge.
customer_reviews.author: engineer

customer_reviews.title: Petal power!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. We've used it during a two week trip to Canada this summer. Only 5 of those days were camping, but the light was utilized all five days. It's not overly bright, but enough to last the wakeful hours of the evening before the kids fall asleep. Being able to hang in the tent is awesome, plus the ability to adjust each "petal" gives different options for lighting. We will be ordering another, maybe two. You'll get a lot of attention from friends. One star off because the solar charging option doesn't seem very effective.
customer_reviews.author: C. Heng

customer_reviews.title: Great Adjustable Camping Solar Light
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little collapsible solar light perfect for camping. It fits well hanging from the top of your tent, or can just as easily be propped up to sit on a table, a rock, or lay flat on the ground. The 3 arms have solar panels on one side which you open and lay flat in the sun to charge. When you want to use the light, the light is on the opposite side of the solar panelled arms. You can move the arms to adjust the angle and the light to your preference. This really is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sturgis

customer_reviews.title: Ill try it... wow this thing is bright LOL
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would just be something entertaining for the kids but didn't think it would be useful. I was wrong. This light is really bright. Contruction isn't amazing, but it is far from cheap as well. Seems solid enough to be thrown in with other thi big s without breaking. Haven't used it much yet except trying it out in the house. Will update after camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! It is very bright (much more so than I expected), compact, versatile (can be charged with a USB cable or solar) and cute! The hanger is nicely tucked away and easy to open up to hang the light. We are going to use it like a tiny chandelier in our hunting cabin. I will most likely order another one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Frogprincess

customer_reviews.title: good quality, and multiple functions
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hubby for Christmas and he loves it! Very bright light, good quality, and multiple functions. Haven't used it for camping yet being winter and all, but this light is awesome! I ended up buying another one for my dads bday! Can't wait to try it out in the elements. Fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for every home, automobile and backpack
customer_reviews.text: Was kind of surprised when I first received it because it was so small but puts out a great bright light that can be set or hung from anywhere. The fact that it can be solo charged or from a wall charger was one of the reasons I bought it. I keep it in my EDC backpack at all times and plan on buying another. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great camping or emergency light
customer_reviews.text: This light works great! We got it for camping and hook attached to the top of it allows it hang right in the tent. The 2 different shades of light and way you can tilt the arms make it very easy to make it brighter or darker in certain areas of the tent. The light is USB rechargeable AND solar rechargeable too! Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Ken Matthews

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME CAMPING LIGHT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful camping light! It has 18 individual LEDs and two levels (high and low) and flashing as well. I love that it folds up and that it charges either by USB cord (which is included) or, by Solar (each light panel has a Solar panel attached on the backside). It gives off a lot of light and hangs above you via the attached fold-out hook. So far, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: William F. Cordsen

customer_reviews.title: but can discern BLUE--so any light change to or from blue would be much more easily seen and understood
customer_reviews.text: My ONLY beef is the color shift of the charging indicator light--I am color-blind, but can discern BLUE--so any light change to or from blue would be much more easily seen and understood. Cool, product--I will add it to my BOB immediately !!
customer_reviews.author: rudy m haldiman

customer_reviews.title: Love it for now.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The only reason I only give it 4 stars is it seems like it may be a little fragile. Would not want to crush or drop it from any considerable height. However, if you take good care of it I am sure it will do you well. If anything changes I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett Radcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Good utilitarian lantern.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly and in good working order. Ordered another brand lantern as well. I like that this one does not sit on the solar panel when in use...also like the larger area of solar panels as well and that they are receptive to multiple directions. The other I ordered is a 'puck' style design. It has more dimming settings and a glow in the dark feature that are all cool. This lantern seems more utiltarian...which can be a good thing. Well see.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: If you camp.....BUY THIS LIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo WHAT EVERYONE NEEDS FOR THEIR CAMPING TUB! May be a little smaller than expected, BUT make up in size with light and handiness! can can, used as a pivot stand, or laid flat! Charges easy, a true lifesaver in a dark camping pinch! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: JenGee

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for father in law. Seems to like it! Small but very bright. Has a hook for hanging in tent etc. Which is what we wanted it for. Solor and a charger. Might end up buying one of my own camping needs.
customer_reviews.author: Misty M

customer_reviews.title: Very bright luminescence
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing! Loved the fact that it is very compact but puts out a very bright luminescence. Would highly recommend buying this item. Arrived on time and just as the description stated. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: RMW

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Great light! Used for primitive camping. Charged nicely and wow, is this light bright. The hook on the top isn't very sturdy but not a big deal. Compact when folder up. Great addition to camping.
customer_reviews.author: Ohhorses

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Hope it Last a Long Time!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it works very well. Light is plenty bright enough for camping and will save me lots of battery money. The workmanship is high quality. The last solar light i bought on amazon was crap. Shipping was prompt. If it last for at least a couple of years I will be happy. One thing I forgot to do when I bought this is to check if you can replace the batteries. It does not look like you can and I do not want to break it until it quits working then I will dissect it.
customer_reviews.author: Reepicheep

customer_reviews.title: We love solar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and have had no feedback yet. I give it 4 stars now for design. The person I gave it to has a cabin without electricity and has several styles of solar lighting. When she received it she told me she likes the design a lot and feels it's going to fit in situations where her other lanterns or lamps do not.
customer_reviews.author: nora

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little solar lights
customer_reviews.text: Sweet little solar lights. Great for camping and any other activity when you need a little light on the subject. Bonus charging applications from standard cell charger and usb. I have a portable power cell that will charge it pretty quickly if the sun isn't cooperating, plus it doesn't drain the portable charger so I can probably charge the light 20x or more if it was absolutely necessary,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Camping!
customer_reviews.text: Great light! I do a lot of hiking/tenting and I get tired of the cheap lights I keep re-purchasing to hang from the center. This is ideal. It's small and light enough to easily fit in my backpack but man ... is it bright!! Quality seems decent, but for the price, I don't expect a whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This light is a well made piece of technology. It arrived well packaged in a sturdy box, and was charged and ready to go. It sheds light over a much larger area than any of the other small solar lights I own, which was my goal in making the purchase. Will add to this review after I see how long the charge holds.
customer_reviews.author: katneils

customer_reviews.title: in a darkened room to easily read a book 5 feet below it
customer_reviews.text: I'M IMPRESSED! Plenty of light to read in a tent, or small camper van, even a 20 ft mobile home! I fired it up right out of the box, and it gave off enough light, in a darkened room to easily read a book 5 feet below it. I'm going camping next week, so we will see about the solar charging capabilities . I'll return to the reviews after that, and see if I can justify raising the rating to a 5.........
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Ooten

customer_reviews.title: I knda like the accompanying recharageable bottle USB watrproof light which is ...
customer_reviews.text: This works as ordered. I knda like the accompanying recharageable bottle USB watrproof light which is a little cheaper - but this has it's own added features. I am glad I have both.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher "Mac" MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: super light, works perfectly when you put it inside the tent, different light modes, you can fold it and put it every where. This is perfect for camping and price is really good, no need for additional light inside the tent. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Fer P.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this light to anyone who need to light a ...
customer_reviews.text: This light is for sure small and compact. But it lights up my screen house with no problems and we were able to see perfectly. My screen house is 12 x 12' and we were playing cards inside of there.. If you put the light on high you will get about two hours on a full charge. I was able to use the light on low and still be able to see. I got roughly three hours on a full charge that way. I would recommend this light to anyone who need to light a small area.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it a fun design, but a functional one too! Likely will be using it for more camping and hiking trips and anything I can take that doesn't require hauling extra batteries is a big bonus. Really like the 3 light modes as well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Minho

customer_reviews.title: Great tent lantern !
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little lantern. I am heading out this weekend to camp and it is going to be great to have this hanging from the top of my tent. No more fumbling for flashlights etc. I charged it up outside yesterday and it seems to work great. There are three light "fingers" so the light disperses in multiple directions instead of a single focused beam.
customer_reviews.author: fundevil

customer_reviews.title: fun light wirleybird
customer_reviews.text: well I charged it last night, and when it got dark outside I tested it out in my house, bright! was like hmmm? I like the shape and style of it. I will b careful with the "hook" but for now I like it........
customer_reviews.author: abby ulacco

customer_reviews.title: Tiny !
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this four stars because I was expecting this product to be bigger. When this arrived, I was taken back by how small it is! The solar panels are about 4.5 inches each 😳 I guess I should have read the reviews closer before purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camp light.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is amazing!! Lights up very well when hung up high in a dark atmosphere. Power outages or camping in forest. See this photo. Light was hung high with a stick front the forest. Charges well in the sun. I'll be buying another for a backup
customer_reviews.author: @93sr20det

customer_reviews.title: Solar lantern
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the lantern. What I like most about it is that it is solar powered as an option to charge it. I charged it outside and it is pretty bright. I can hang it if I need to. It's good to have for camping or whatever but I like to have it as a backup foe emergencies. It was easy to order on amazon, it was eligible for free ship through my Prime membership and got it within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Di  L

customer_reviews.title: Useful and nifty gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend who loves solar, LED lights, gadgets, and camping. It's maybe a bit too bright when unfolded completely, but can be easily adjusted to not be shining in your eyes. But a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best solor light inside house use
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than expected but works better than expected. We use it above the dining table and its bright enough. We have no power by typhoon yutu and generaters are all sold out on this Island so this solor light works for us very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little light
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing, it's bright and can charge itself in the sun or you can charge it via USB. It's a versatile lamp would buy again and may buy one or two more just because.
customer_reviews.author: NRF

customer_reviews.title: I found this product almost the same as the Suaoki ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this product almost the same as the Suaoki Collapsible Clover Style 18 lamp. At home and outdoors, I have made use of the many ways of attachment this lamp has to offer! The lamp DOES CHARGE a lot with its very remote source: THE SUN... Right at this moment, the lamp is withstanding the weather of Los Alpes, Coronado, Costa Rica (August), where it is raining continuosly.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Douglas Maynard Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Tested it out this past weekend on a camping trip. Bright and lasted the three or so hours we were playing cards in the tent. Only stayed for one night so couldn't tell how much of a charge it had available. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: outdoorsy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great, i use it camping both in the test and outside. Went not camping I use it in a shed.
customer_reviews.author: tonyzullo

customer_reviews.title: Regaurdless this little guy was fantastic. Even got wet and still worked
customer_reviews.text: Alot smaller than I expected, but I should have read the measurements before purchacing. Regaurdless this little guy was fantastic. Even got wet and still worked. Used it all weekend camping and gave off sufficient light to play games and make dinner in the dark. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sara A

customer_reviews.title: but it's really cool. I hope I get it back otherwise I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my "swap" gift and now I want to keep it! It definitely threw me off when it came in such a small package, but it's really cool. I hope I get it back otherwise I will be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nastar

customer_reviews.title: Compact light
customer_reviews.text: Small adjustable led, arrived fully charged with 3 light strengths
customer_reviews.author: Ori

customer_reviews.title: The product looks great and produces bright light
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great and produces bright light. Can't wait to use it for our next campout. The only thing I'm concerned about is the hook for hanging that doesn't look sturdy enough especially if you hang it on your backpack to charge under the sun while hiking. I was able to modify it though so no problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: B-rod

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, but wanted to keep it for camping trips. It is small enough that it can be stored easily, but the light is very bright. Also has two settings, high and low, as well as a flashing sos.
customer_reviews.author: bnv832

customer_reviews.title: Great value in portable, solar lighting!
customer_reviews.text: This little light can sure shine! Compact enough to keep packed for travel or home emergencies. Each leaf can be manipulated independently to provide precise lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Mount Byter

customer_reviews.title: ... and I found it to be one of the best gadgets I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for camping and backpacking and I found it to be one of the best gadgets I have ever bought. Not only has a super cool shape and style, but also has great funcionality and performance. Is solar, but also has USB charging port. I charge it once and it lasted two days with a single charge. Is the best gadget I ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: SpineCareDoc1

customer_reviews.title: Great light. Charges fast and plenty bright.
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Charges fast and plenty bright. It has a hidden hook to attach it to the tent. 3 settings, bright, brighter and flashing.
customer_reviews.author: Piko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I love that I can position it tripod and the light lights up the ground like 10'
customer_reviews.author: T. C.

customer_reviews.title: I have not tried to rely in the solar recharge because the USB recharge is so quick and easy (when car camping)
customer_reviews.text: Wow, i wish I had this years ago when I did more camping. It is so versatile. I have not tried to rely in the solar recharge because the USB recharge is so quick and easy (when car camping). It is VERY bright!
customer_reviews.author: T. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Solar Light
customer_reviews.text: I charged this light before I left for Haiti then used it for eight days in Haiti without having to recharge it. Worked excellent!!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Swankosky

customer_reviews.title: Great camping light
customer_reviews.text: Great little addition to my camping equipment. This is my second one I purchased due to liking my first one so much.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Bright and portable!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second batch of these lights I have ordered. My whole family loves mine so these are for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love it for the price! Easy to use, and lights up the tent very well. My only change would be a larger button as it can be hard to find at night.
customer_reviews.author: I Like Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Pleased as punch!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and provides sustained bright light. I love the portability and compactness of this light. Also, the followup email was a very nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: June C

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift I ever gave apparently!
customer_reviews.text: I have this as a white elephant gift and 6 months later the person I gave it to still tells me what a great product it is. I guess I need to get one!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel and Grace

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Think I found my new go to lighting solution for camping. Makes the propane lanterns nearly obselete
customer_reviews.author: George Bogaski

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Took it on a 7 day camp trip- works great! solar charged great (needed to charge it on the 4th day) used it only for about 3 hours a night. Impressed with the overall quality
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my son-in-law... ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son-in-law.....he was very impressed and excited to try it out. The light is very bright, along with being very compact, making it the perfect addition to any backpack, whether camping or just hiking the trails.The seller provided exceptional customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money and then some.
customer_reviews.text: This light I used all summer long camping and it performed perfectly. Has the settings, low, high, and strobe. Solar charges great and also can charge with your typical micro USB charger. I really have enjoyed this light
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: Light worked very well for about 3 days. Returned it for refund. No offer was made to send a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit smaller than I expected, but WOW, it's very bright! Definitely useful for camping or emergencies (I live in earthquake country). I look forward to testing it's performance next weekend on a camping trip!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Review

customer_reviews.title: Operates better than expected
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY as described. Operates better than expected. Great tool, and great to have around!
customer_reviews.author: Todd C.

customer_reviews.title: so I can store it easily with my emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: Small and compact, so I can store it easily with my emergency kit. The fact that it can hang will be very helpful, and the panels can be pointed in direction to focus the light.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Bumby

customer_reviews.title: fine little light charges via usb or solar solar charge ...
customer_reviews.text: fine little light charges via usb or solar solar charge is real slow If it's not waterproof, it's for sure water (rain) resistant!
customer_reviews.author: Smile User 123

customer_reviews.title: Folding clover solar light
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my solar lantern. It is light weight and compact. Perfect for backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: lsm

customer_reviews.title: YEAH BABY!!
customer_reviews.text: I COULDN'T BELIEVE HOW SMALL THIS PRODUCT IS...AND THE LIGHT IT PROJECTS IN MY SCREEN HOUSE...I'M THRILLED!!
customer_reviews.author: THE WONDERFUL TEE

customer_reviews.title: Nice for inexpensive product
customer_reviews.text: Concept of the light is excellent. But I wish it wasn't made in China. While everything is functional, it seems brittle in construction. Customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Toth

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. It's nice and bright. It has a handy light to indicate when it's fully charged. But the battery only powers the light for 1.5 to 3 hours. Flimsy hanging hook.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: cool how it works as a ceiling light in the ...
customer_reviews.text: cool how it works as a ceiling light in the tent. very bright light. great for changing positions and angles. hard to tell if it is charged enough though.
customer_reviews.author: T Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Get this light!
customer_reviews.text: Very portable, bright and easily charged. Just recently used it on a week long camping trip. I read by the light every night. Laid it out during the day to charge, but light does last long.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great camping/hiking gadget
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great camping/hiking gadget! It's compact yet powerful! I love that it's both solar rechargeable and USB rechargeable. The hanging feature is awesome as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior Product
customer_reviews.text: This product works great simple to use puts out great light charges quick. I had been sold on blow up brand but this is much better.
customer_reviews.author: popig

customer_reviews.title: Everything was in good shape. I am looking foreword to using it ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got it as promised. Everything was in good shape. I am looking foreword to using it for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: DAW

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Cool product. Works great for the price! Just wish it wasn’t so bright in the lower setting.
customer_reviews.author: Darren W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! After seeing it's performance
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! After seeing it's performance, bought a couple more. Perfectly designed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cool LED solar light
customer_reviews.text: Super cool LED solar light. Stays lit for 6-7 hrs (on low) but low is still very bright. Would highly recommend this for camping or better yet for an emergency light should you lose power at home.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Great light for inside a dark room or in your ...
customer_reviews.text: Great light for inside a dark room or in your tent. Very bright. But, it doesn't stay on as long as they say. I ran a test. Low it ran about 3 hr. and 37 min. and on hi just about 1 hr. and 24 min. This is still a very bright light and will light light up a small room or your tent.
customer_reviews.author: K.L. Bear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super compact, charges quickly, nice bright light. Perfect for camping
customer_reviews.author: family of 5

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was pictured. Seems to work fine although have yet to see how solar charges.
customer_reviews.author: Stosh

customer_reviews.title: Is a great addition to my utility survival belt!
customer_reviews.text: Very Useful and easy carry item, like a Swiss knife.
customer_reviews.author: youngfam

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: This light illuminates great light. Very useful for camping or power outages. I added this to my emergency kit. It is always charging so no worries of not being ready. It also has a setting for flashing lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is super bright works awesomely even charges inside with low light. Must add to any camping equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Arthur Weeder

customer_reviews.title: Bright compact solar lamp
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact. Easily fits into my backpack. Love the low profile and hook for hanging it inside of my tent. Very bright even on the low setting.
customer_reviews.author: VSM

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller that expected.
customer_reviews.text: Way way smaller than expected. But i still like the product so ill give 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Botzilla

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: The light itself is not large, but it is extremely bright. Not only is it blinding, it is pretty neat gadget to give for a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Sparkle light is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific little product. It is light weight and constructed well. I like I can charge two ways. Different color choices on the case might be nice but not a big deal. When charging via USB, the charge light is covered by the USB cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a great product for camping and home preparedness
customer_reviews.text: Shipped Lickety split to me. I think this is a great product for camping and home preparedness. The Led lights are bright (100) lumens and will last four hrs on bright. Party on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this!! So cool and works very well, just need to be somewhat gentle with it so not for kids that's for sure, but it does what it says!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Versatile Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Light is a very nice small lamp with a lot of versatility. Came well packaged and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive light!
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked the idea of solar lights while camping but I've been disappointed with the amount of light they put out. I decided to give this one a try because of the reviews. I will add my 5-star review to the list! I used the hook to hang it from the top of our tent. It easily provided enough light for the entire space (12-man spring bar tent). It wasn't super bright in all of the corners for detailed lighting, but it was good enough. I'm going to get a few more of these to fill in the holes and to light another tent. The best solar light I've ever seen or used!
customer_reviews.author: jlwrvw

customer_reviews.title: Compact, efficient & useful!
customer_reviews.text: Small but very efficient & portable. Really like the compact style & 3-way lighting. Solar powered, this is very useful for our rv lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Slaughter--Dakota Sunshine Express

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! I bought it for camping, but very handy to have around when an extra light is needed. May need to be a bit careful with the little hanger...looks a little fragile. You can never grow wrong with solar!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy0253

customer_reviews.title: Fifteen minutes does not seem like a very long lighting
customer_reviews.text: Not so sure about the solar capability. Fifteen minutes does not seem like a very long lighting period
customer_reviews.author: P. W.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great light easy to charge and lights up the entire room. Cool stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L

product_meta.title: Folding Clover Solar LED 100 Lumen Camping Lantern | USB Rechargeable and Solar Chargeable | 3 Level Brightness Including SOS Flashing | Hurricane Storm Tent Lantern | Only 6" High
product_meta.description:
Going camping yet concerned about batteries for your tent lantern? No need to worry with SparkLED's new solar lantern featuring both solar and micro USB charging. Keep it at home as an emergency or storm light, and bring it with you hiking, camping, or travelling so you won't be stranded with no lights at night.

The SparkLED Clover Folding Lantern can be fully charged in 30 minutes via USB charge or fully charged in 12 hours via the three solar power panels

Product Specifications: 
Built-in battery: 680mAh/3.7V Lithium battery 
Solar panel: Ply-Si 4.5V, 18 Leds 
High power brightness: 100 Lumens
Lower power brightness: 50 Lumens
High level lighting time after fully charged: 90 Minutes 
Low level lighting time after fully charged: 3 hours 
Flash level lighting time after fully charged: 4 hours Usage time after 1 hour solar charging: 30 minutes 
Product weight: 6 ounces
Battery life: 50,000 hours
Water resistance: IPX2 

Each unit contains a 6" Folding Tripod Camping Light, a USB charging cord, and an instruction manual.

100% SATISFACTION WARRANTY - Upper West Companies is one of the fastest growing stores on Amazon for a reason! Shop with confidence, your satisfaction is our guarantee - 1 year money back
feature_bullets: Convenient to Carry: portable, foldable and durable, this lantern can be adjusted to any particular space to fit your current needs. Shorter than iPhone 6 plus, it can be folded down completely to take the least space in your backpack.

Versatile Lighting Source: you can choose one of three lighting modes: high, low or SOS blinking, perfect for outdoor activities like camping, hiking, fishing, or a light source for late-at-night porch readings.

Solar Charging: turbo charge via the micro USB port in 3.5 hours with full battery. Three individual solar panels support charging when in emergency outdoor conditions with no outlets or power source.
Thoughtful Details: Hidden hanging hook design allows you to place the light on outdoor occasions such as camping light for your tent.

RISK FREE PURCHASE - 100% money back satisfaction guaranteed. Upper West Companies is one of the fastest growing stores on Amazon for a reason! If you are unhappy for any reason, the manufacturer will refund your purchase fully.
